title: Gooey Butter Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease a flour 9x13 pan. Mix the pkg cream cheese with the cake mix, 1 egg, cold water. The batter will be slightly thick. Spread in prepared pan. Side: Mix confectioner's sugar, 8 oz cream cheese, vanilla, and eggs. Spread over first batter already in the pan. Bake 40 mins. Dust with powdered sugar and let cool in pan.
